title: HoP 319 - Georgia on My Mind - Petritsi and the Proclus Revival
itunes:title: HoP 319 - Georgia on My Mind - Petritsi and the Proclus Revival
description: The Neoplatonist Proclus gets mixed reviews from Christians, as Nicholas of Methone refutes him but the Georgian philosopher Ioane Petritsi helps to revive his thought.
content:encoded: The Neoplatonist Proclus gets mixed reviews from Christians, as Nicholas of Methone refutes him but the Georgian philosopher Ioane Petritsi helps to revive his thought.
